newsitem.title: USA: Morgan completes Weibel, Knox acquisitions.
newsitem.headline: Morgan completes Weibel, Knox acquisitions.

text.p: Morgan Keegan Inc said Friday it had completed the acquisitions of all assets of Weibel Huffman Keegan Inc, a Memphis-based investment advisory firm, and also the purchase of Atlanta-based Knox, Wall & Co.
Terms were not disclosed in either deal.
Knox, Wall is an investment firm that provides municipal bond sales, trading and underwriting services to clients in Georgia and Florida.
Weibel Huffman provides investment counseling and advisory services. The firm manages about $100 million in assets.

Two of Weibel Huffman's former owners, Carl Weibel and Susan Logan Huffman, will join Morgan Asset Management as portfolio managers. Former owner James Keegan will serve as a consultant, Morgan Keegan said.
